full_summary:
### Translation Services from English to French (#5Z011-23-0096)
#### Solicitation Information

* **Title (English)**: Translation Services from English to French
* **Title (French)**: Services de traduction de l’anglais vers le français
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01005071
* **Modification Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: 5Z011-23-0096
* **Publication Date**: 2022-08-23
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-04T14:00:00 (expired)
* **Amendment Date**: 2022-09-26

#### Contract Information

* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to qualified contractors who are able to meet the requirements of the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Regions of Opportunity

* **National Capital Region (NCR)**
* **Region of the National Capital (RCN)**

#### Contracting Entity

* **Library and Archives Canada ( English ) / Bibliothèque et Archives Canada (French)**
* **Address:** 395 Wellington Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0N4, Canada
* **Contact Information**
	+ **Name:** Anne-Marie Aubry
	+ **Email:** [receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca](mailto:receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca)
	+ **Phone:** 613-716-2173
